Description: This hazard subtype comprises all epidemic or pandemic outbreaks of human infectious diseases. These include viral, bacterial, parasitic, fungal and Prion diseases.

This subtype includes pervasive influx and development of insects, parasites, plants or animals affecting crops, humans, animals, fishes, vegetation, stored food and materials, as well as epidemic events on animals and plants that affect ecosystems and the livestock and agricultural sectors.
